reviewText:
Good Dvd I find some of her exercises are harder for me to do, do to my knees being arthritic. I rotate between her and some of my other Dvd's as not to get bored.
Thanks Joyce M.

this sucks !!! its to fast. not for  a 61 year with knee problems.if you tune it down some this would be a nice exercise video.we are seniors some of us can't move that fast.i purchased this one and the one with band.they are both in te garbage. what a waste of money.
This is a great exercise DVD for seniors. I have been using for 1 month & am getting results. I can do both sessions or just one.  Cardio works & strength exercises are not too hard to do.

I have two others of Susan Tuttle's DVDs. I like them because even though I'm sitting in a chair, I end up sweating a little. On this DVD, you have the option of sitting the whole time or standing part of the time, which is nice. She has a nice manner and everything is explained carefully.
She moves to fast  for some one in a wheelchair.

I broke my leg and screwed up my ankle in march, I am now in an ankle brace and wanted to get back into my routine of exercise.  I can no longer do my regular routine which include another tape by Susan so I decided to try this one and her one with the bans for those who are seniors or recovering from injuries.  these tapes are great, I can do them with comfort yet still press myself to use heavier weights or stronger bans.  Susan is wonderful in what she teaches.  Great tapes!
